Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex where ContentType ='{{type}}'
Queries.Name: GetItemsForHackathon

Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex where ContentType ='Score' and TeamContentItemId = '{{teamContentItemId}}' and Owner = '{{owner}}'
Queries.Name: GetScoreEntry

Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex where ContentType ='Team' and ContentItemId = '{{teamContentItemId}}'
Queries.Name: GetTeam

Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM CandevItemsIndex WHERE ContentType ='Challenge' AND Owner = '{{owner}}'
Queries.Name: GetChallengeSubmissionsForOwner

TitlePartSettings.Pattern:
{% assign case = ContentItem.Content.Team.Case.LocalizationSets | localization_set: 'en' | first %}
{{ case | display_text | slugify }}-{{ContentItem.Content.Team.Name.Text}}-{{ ContentItem.Id }}

NumericFieldSettings.Hint: The maximum number of participants. Set to 0 for unlimited

HtmlBodyPart.Html: Follow us using #CANDEV mdi-linkedin mdi-twitter mdi-facebook mdi-instagram mdi-youtube
Suivez-nous avec #CANDEV mdi-linkedin mdi-twitter mdi-facebook mdi-instagram mdi-youtube

col.Hint: Renders a column. to be used inside a [row] shortcode. Please see the https://vuetifyjs.com/en/api/v-col/#api-props docs for available properties. The cols property can be passed as the first argument

row.Hint: Renders a row. Please see the https://vuetifyjs.com/en/api/v-row/#api-props docs for available properties.

container.Hint: Renders a container. Please see the https://vuetifyjs.com/en/api/v-container/#api-props docs for available properties.

spacer.Hint: renders a v-spacer. See https://vuetifyjs.com/en/components/grids/#v-spacer for docs.

{{ my_content | shape_build_display | shape_render }}
